name: Bacon Duel
description:
You awake in your two-bedroom apartment starving for breakfast. As you start to cook your delicious bacon, your roommate grabs a another slab of bacon and fights you for the microwave over a frying pan placed directly under your grandfather's vast chicken egg supply.

It's up to you to win the fight to be able to cook your bacon. Will you succeed or fail?

Plays similar to pong, but with "millions" of eggs. Eggs move fast, can crack and explode the egg yolk everywhere, and are everywhere.

Credits:

Jacob Peltola: Art, Code, Sound & Music, Design

Nick Mudry: Additional Programming, Game Design
